recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Cream butter and sugar until fluffy.
Add egg and vanilla extract.
Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 8-10 minutes until golden.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Mix all ingredients until smooth.
Roll into balls and flatten with a fork.
Place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 10 minutes until edges are set.

recipes.name: Banana Bread
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C and grease a loaf tin.
Mash bananas and mix with melted butter.
Add sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract.
Fold in flour and cinnamon.
Pour into tin.
Bake for 50 minutes until a skewer comes out clean.

recipes.name: Blueberry Muffins
steps: Preheat oven to 200°C and line a muffin tin.
Mix flour and sugar in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk melted butter, milk, egg, and vanilla.
Combine wet and dry ingredients gently.
Fold in blueberries.
Spoon into tin.
Bake for 20 minutes until risen and golden.

recipes.name: Lemon Bars
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C and line a baking tin.
Mix 200g flour, icing sugar, and butter for base; press into tin.
Bake base for 20 minutes.
Whisk eggs, sugar, 50g flour, lemon juice, and extract for filling.
Pour over baked base.
Bake for another 20 minutes until set.
Cool and dust with extra icing sugar.

recipes.name: Chocolate Brownies
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C and line a square tin.
Melt chocolate and butter together.
Stir in sugar, then eggs and vanilla.
Fold in flour and coco powder.
Pour into tin.
Bake for 25 minutes until fudgy.

recipes.name: Cinnamon Rolls
steps: Dissolve yeast in warm milk.
Mix flour, sugar, salt, egg, and softened butter; add milk mixture.
Knead dough and let rise for 1 hour.
Roll out dough, spread filling, roll up, and cut into slices.
Place in tin and let rise for 30 minutes.
Bake at 190°C for 25 minutes.

recipes.name: Jam Tarts
steps: Mix flour, butter, and sugar until crumbly.
Add water to form dough; chill for 30 minutes.
Roll out and cut circles to fit tart tin.
Fill with jam.
Bake at 180°C for 15 minutes until golden.

recipes.name: Vanilla Cupcakes
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C and line a cupcake tin.
Cream butter and sugar.
Add eggs one at a time, then vanilla.
Fold in flour and milk.
Spoon into cases.
Bake for 20 minutes until sprung back.

recipes.name: Carrot Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C and grease a cake tin.
Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon.
In another bowl, whisk sugar, eggs, butter, and vanilla.
Add grated carrots and nuts to wet mixture.
Combine with dry ingredients.
Pour into tin.
Bake for 40 minutes until firm.
